def remove_duplicates(my_list):
    seen = set()
    result = [x for x in my_list if not (x in seen and seen.add(x))]
    return result

def remove_duplicates(my_list):
    seen = set()
    result = [x for x in my_list if not (x not in seen or seen.add(x))]
    return result
